entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call may be recorded for quality assurance. Please state your reason for calling.
Yeah, hi. I'm calling about a return. I bought a VeloBand Pulse a little while ago, and it's just not working out for me. I need to return it.
Okay, I can certainly help you with that. Can I get your order number or the email address associated with your purchase, please?
It's… hold on… it's [customer email address].
Thank you. One moment while I pull up your order… Okay, I see your purchase of the VeloBand Pulse. I understand you’d like to return it. Can you tell me why you are returning the device?
It's just not as accurate as I'd hoped. The heart rate monitoring is off, and it’s messing with my training data. It’s been only a little over a week, so this should be no problem, right?

I understand your frustration with the VeloBand Pulse's performance. I've checked your order details and I see the purchase was made 15 days ago. Unfortunately, our standard return window for electronics, including the VeloBand Pulse, is 10 days.
What?! Seriously? Ten days? That’s ridiculous! I barely had time to even properly test it! I want to speak with a manager.

I understand your frustration, and I apologize for the inconvenience. While I cannot authorize a full refund outside of the return window, let me see if I can offer you an alternative. I am unable to make a policy exception at this time.
An alternative? What alternative? I want my money back. This is useless to me.

While I can't offer a refund, I can offer you store credit for the full purchase amount of the VeloBand Pulse. This store credit can be used towards any other product on our website, perhaps a different model with enhanced heart rate accuracy? We also have a sale going on right now.
Store credit? Hmm… I guess I could use it to get something else. What about the VeloFit Smart Scale? I've been looking at that.

That's a great option! The VeloFit Smart Scale is very popular. With the store credit from your VeloBand Pulse return, it should significantly reduce the out-of-pocket cost. Would you like me to help you with that order?
Okay, fine. Let's do the store credit. And yeah, help me look at the Smart Scale.
Certainly. I've applied the store credit to your account. Now, let's take a look at the VeloFit Smart Scale...
Okay, great. Thank you for your help. I appreciate you finding a solution that works.
You're very welcome! I'm glad we could find a solution. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's all. Thanks again!
Thank you for choosing VeloFit. Have a great day!
